entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
